user_prompt: Build an Uno Platform cross-platform app and fetch current Uno docs via MCP before proposing the architecture.
Implement a Roslyn analyzer that flags when ConfigureAwait(false) is missing in library code paths.
Build a C# source generator that creates strongly-typed wrappers for configuration sections.
Design a domain model with value objects, aggregates, and invariant enforcement for an order management system.
Set up Azure DevOps build pipelines with restore, build, test, and artifact publishing for my .NET solution.
Implement SignalR hubs for real-time dashboard updates with strongly-typed hub methods and reconnection handling.
Design a secrets management strategy using user secrets in dev, Key Vault in production, and environment-based config providers.
Configure .editorconfig with C# code style rules, naming conventions, and severity levels for my team.
Build high-throughput data pipelines using System.IO.Pipelines with proper memory management and backpressure.
Implement producer-consumer patterns using System.Threading.Channels for decoupled async processing.
Set up snapshot testing with Verify to test complex object serialization and approval-based workflow.
Profile my .NET application memory allocations and CPU hotspots using dotnet-trace and dotnet-counters.
Migrate my WPF desktop application to use modern .NET with updated controls, MSIX packaging, and Windows App SDK interop.
Build a MAUI cross-platform mobile app with platform-specific implementations and dependency injection.
Configure multi-targeting for a library that supports net8.0, net9.0, and netstandard2.0 with conditional compilation.
Build a Spectre.Console rich CLI with tables, progress bars, and interactive prompts for a data migration tool.
Implement request validation using FluentValidation with async validators, custom rules, and dependency injection.
Set up ASP.NET Core middleware for request/response logging, exception handling, and correlation ID propagation.
Design an API versioning strategy with URL path, header, and query string approaches using Asp.Versioning.
Implement encryption, hashing, and digital signatures using .NET cryptography APIs with proper key management.
Optimize my LINQ queries to reduce allocations using spans, value tuples, and avoiding materializing intermediate collections.
Build a GitHub Actions workflow for deploying my .NET app to Azure App Service with staging slots and approval gates.
Set up .NET Aspire for local development orchestration with service defaults, dashboard, and integrations.
Implement the HttpClient factory pattern with typed clients, Polly handlers, and DelegatingHandler for auth tokens.
Configure P/Invoke and CsWin32 for calling native Windows APIs from my .NET application.
